extName.description: Title of the extension, shown in the extensions tab

extDescription.message: Toont het aantal ongelezen berichten in Google Reader
extDescription.description: Brief description of the extension, shown in the extensions tab

clickToLogin.description: When not logged in, the icon is shown in black/white and this text is the title of the icon

totalUnreadOne.description: Used in the icon's title when only one unread item is available

totalUnread.description: Used in the icon's title when more than one unread item is available

noticeUnreadOne.description: Used in notifications when only one unread item is available

noticeUnread.description: Used in notifications when more than one unread item is available

noticeSuffix.description: Suffix of text used in notifications

optionsSaveNotice.description: Status message shown when options are saved

optionsUseHTTPS.message: Controleer en open Google Reader over een beveiligde verbinding

optionsPollInterval.message: tijd in seconden tussen het controleren op nieuwe ongelezen berichten

optionsShowNotifications.message: Toon notificaties wanneer nieuwe ongelezen berichten beschikbaar zijn
